price: Twaranamuhaye intumbero mu vyo ahingura Duti: “Hingura impuzu zikingira umubiri wose mu ndwano, kandi ziremurutse zihinguwe ku rugero rukenewe. Hanyuma muheze rero, wewe n’umuryango wawe mukore ivyiza bitegetswe. Mu vy’ukuri, Jewe Allah Ndabona neza ivyo mukora, Ndi Nyenukubona”.
arabic: أَنِ ٱعۡمَلۡ سَٰبِغَٰتٖ وَقَدِّرۡ فِي ٱلسَّرۡدِۖ وَٱعۡمَلُواْ صَٰلِحًاۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ

meta.transliteration: ani iʿ'mal sābighātin waqaddir fī al-sardi wa-iʿ'malū ṣāliḥan innī bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
